title: Model Deprecations Announced
description: GitHub announced deprecation of select Copilot models across all experiences including Claude Opus 4.1, Gemini 2.5 Pro, GPT-5, and GPT-5-Codex. These will be deprecated on February 17, 2026. GitHub suggests alternatives: Claude Opus 4.5, Gemini 3 Pro, and GPT-5.2.

title: Visual Studio 2026 Integration Update
description: The Visual Studio 2026 January Update (version 18.2.0) includes GitHub Copilot enhancements and NuGet MCP Server integration.

title: Model Lifecycle Feature Launch
description: Gemini API launched a model lifecycle feature on January 12, 2026, allowing models to specify their lifecycle stage and deprecation timeline.

title: Version 1.13.6 Release
description: Windsurf released version 1.13.6 on January 11, 2026, updating Code OSS to version 1.105.0 (Electron 37.6.0) with new features and dependency updates.

title: Session Secrets API and Code Updates View
description: Devin release notes from January 9, 2026 show Session Secrets via API capability and the ability to view code updates during sessions by clicking into Devin's progress.

title: Agent Skills Support
description: Codex CLI now supports agent skills - reusable bundles of instructions that help automate tasks. Users can invoke skills using the syntax $skill-name in both CLI and IDE environments.

title: AI Toolkit for VS Code Update
description: AI Toolkit for VS Code received a January 2026 update focusing on alignment with latest GitHub Copilot standards, new debugging tools, and enhanced capabilities.

title: CLI Update with MCP Management
description: Cursor released a CLI update on January 8, 2026 featuring new CLI controls for models, Model Context Protocol (MCP) management, rules implementation, and performance improvements to the hooks system.

community_feedback.quote: On January 6th, 2026, Cursor quietly dropped something that changes how AI coding agents work. No launch event
Couple of upgrades about a year ago that were quite significant

title: AI Agent Worktree Support
description: Windsurf Next update on January 8, 2026 added AI agent worktree support, allowing users to use Windsurf's AI agent with worktrees to explore and modify code across multiple branches simultaneously.

community_feedback.quote: The battle between AI-powered code editors has intensified dramatically in early 2026

title: Claude Code 2.1.0 Major Release
description: Claude Code 2.1.0 released with 16 major changes including skill hot-reload capability, smarter agents, smoother workflows, image source metadata handling, clickable paths, winget install support, and architectural improvements. Version 2.1.3 also released with bug fixes.

community_feedback.quote: It's breathtaking how fast the Claude Code team ships
Users advise downgrading to v2.0.61 or v2.0.76 as the only confirmed way to stop excessive token consumption in the CLI
Breaking bug with version number - semver doesn't support date suffix format
Hacker News commenters questioned reliability after rapid commits

title: Claude Opus 3 Model Retirement
description: Anthropic retired the Claude Opus 3 model (claude-3-opus-20240229) on January 5, 2026. All requests to this model now return an error. Anthropic recommends upgrading to Claude Opus 4.5.
